CommonFields.Title: Study on microstructure and dielectric property of the BaTiO3/epoxy resin composites
Author: Dang, Zhi-Min
Yu, Yan-Fei
Xu, Hai-Ping
Bai, Jinbo
CommonFields.Location: Key Laboratory of Beijing City on Preparation and Processing of Novel Polymer Materials and Key Laboratory of the Ministry of Education on Nanomaterials, Beijing University of Chemical Technology, Beijing 100029, PR China

Additive.Description: MeTHPA was chosen as a hardener in 10/4 (EPR/MeTHPA) weight ratio

MolecularWeight.description: The amount of KH550 and BYK-9010 was 1.0 wt% in comparison with the BaTiO3 powders
The amount of KH550 and BYK-9010 was 1.0 wt% in comparison with the BaTiO3 powders

ChooseParameter.Other: Suspensions containing BaTiO3 powder, KH550 and solvent were prepared in a polytetrafluoroethylene (PTFE) bottle

Mixing.Description: Ultrasonic was applied to the suspensions.

Additive.Description: EPR and curing agent were added into the suspensions.

MoldingInfo.Description: Samples were cured at temperature range between 150 and 160 degrees celsius

Dielectric_Real_Permittivity.description: Dielectric Permittivity of 60 vol% BaTiO3/EPR composite with KH550, Taken at room temperature

Dielectric_Loss_Tangent.description: Loss Tangent of 60 vol% BaTiO3/EPR composite with KH550. Taken at room temperature

ImageFile.Description: Microstructure of fractured surface of 0.1 micrometers loading nanocomposite with 1% KH550
Microstructure of fractured surface of the composite loading 0.1 micrometers BaTiO3 at 60 vol%
